directions: In a large mixing bowl, combine the milk and pudding mix. Beat with electric beaters for 1 minute. Add pumpkin, cinnamon, ginger and cloves and beat for an additional minute. Pour filling into the prepared crust. Cover and chill for 2 hours or until firm.
ingredients: 2 (1.5 ounce) envelopes sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (9 inch) reduced fat graham cracker pie crust
title: Pumpkin Chiffon Pie II
